projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce project utilizing Asp.NET Core MVC, Identity, Entity Framework, SQL Server, and JavaScript. Implemented user authentication, product management, and order processing.

projects.title: Microsoft DICE Features
projects.description: Enhanced React JS applications with features like recent search functionality, accessibility improvements, and dynamic UI elements.

projects.title: BP Shipping Database Management
projects.description: Developed and maintained database management systems for vetting and clearance teams using ASP.NET WebAPI and SQL Server.
